prop10mil.Name: 10 Million
prop10mil.Description: Enemy Denounce Their Form Of Government For Yours!

prop25mil.Name: 25 Million
prop25mil.Description: Of The Enemys Population Declare Allegiance to Your Country!

prop50mil.Name: 50 Million
prop50mil.Description: Of The Enemys Population Declare Allegiance to Your Country!

secret_revolution.Name: REVOLUTION!
secret_revolution.Description: Your enemys political system collapses and half of their provinces declare independence. While they are sorting it out, they lose a turn, must throw away their entire hand, and must draw 9 new cards on their next turn. (This includes all face up cards, submarines, cannons, etc.)
secret_revolution.Short Desc: Target player loses a turn and all of their cards, but draws 9 new cards

secret_riots.Name: Riots!
secret_riots.Description: Due to an unfortunate decision by a referee at a sports event, your enemys biggest city erupts in riots and they lose 10 million people.

secret_twister.Name: Twister!
secret_twister.Description: A violent tornado results in a loss of 10 MILLION to your own population

secret_annex.Name: WARCRIME!
secret_annex.Description: Your enemy attempts to annex their smaller neighbor, but to their dismay, the ENTIRE WORLD comes to the rescue of the neighbor, accusing your enemy of crimes against humanity. The disaster costs them 25 Million people.

secret_ghost.Name: Without a trace...
secret_ghost.Description: 25 Million people mysteriously vanish from the enemy's country

secret_recession.Name: RECESSION!
secret_recession.Description: The entire world is having an economic recession except for your country! Two million people move to your country from every other player in the game.
secret_recession.Short Desc: Gain 2M for each player in the game, each enemy loses 2M

secret_eco_terrorism.Name: NO NUKES!
secret_eco_terrorism.Description: Eco-Terrorists sabotage your defense headquarters. They claim nuclear war is bad for the planet. YOU LOSE TWO TURNS.

secret_lose10mil.Name: YOU LOSE 10 MILLION
secret_lose10mil.Description: 10 Million of your own people leave your country (and the game) for a neutral country.

secret_retire.Name: RETIRING!
secret_retire.Description: Famous talk show host retires. Tonight is his last show. Everyone in your country is watching TV. YOU LOSE ONE TURN

secret_virus.Name: COMPUTER VIRUS!
secret_virus.Description: A nasty computer virus has infected computers world-wide. When this card is drawn, everyone in the game must immediately switch their two face-down cards
secret_virus.Short Desc: All players swap their two face-down cards

secret_ban.Name: TEST BAN!
secret_ban.Description: Your president declares a Test Ban on nuclear weapons and FORFEITS ONE TURN.

secret_budget.Name: COMEDIC NAMING!
secret_budget.Description: Your budget proposal for a defense system with a silly name is laughed out of the legislature. YOU LOSE ONE TURN.

secret_taxes.Name: TAX HIKE!
secret_taxes.Description: Your enemy raises taxes 100% this year. 5 Million of their people move to your country

secret_peace.Name: PEACE CORPS!
secret_peace.Description: 2 Million of the enemy's people leave their homeland to join your form of superior government. NOTE: Does not apply once nuclear war has started
secret_peace.Short Desc: Take 2M from enemy if not at war

secret_massacre.Name: MASSACRE!
secret_massacre.Description: Your enemy cancels a public demonstration with machine guns. It was a BIG demonstration. They lose 2 million people

secret_summit.Name: Summit Talks
secret_summit.Description: You have tricked the enemy into an ineffective but time-consuming Summit Talk. Their wasted efforts result in the LOSS OF ONE TURN.

secret_mars.Name: MARS PROBE!
secret_mars.Description: Your country lands the first successful Mars probe. One million people flock to your country from neutral countries (take one million from the discard pile)

secret_suicide_squad.Name: SUICIDE BOMBERS!
secret_suicide_squad.Description: You lose 1 million people, but your enemy loses 5 million.

secret_moon_landing.Name: MOON LANDING!
secret_moon_landing.Description: Your Cold War prestige soars due to being first on the moon! 5 Million of the enemy defect to seek aerospace jobs in your country.

secret_baby_boom.Name: BABY BOOM!
secret_baby_boom.Description: Your country's population increases by 5 Million

secret_market_boom.Name: Stock Market Super Boom!
secret_market_boom.Description: 2 Million of the enemy's population immigrate to your country in hopes of reaping the benefits of your system.

secret_hippies.Name: BAN THE BOMB!
secret_hippies.Description: 2 Million of the enemy's Hippy Pacifists protest nuclear war and deflect to your country.

secret_alcohol.Name: DRUNK AT THE U.N.!
secret_alcohol.Description: Enemy ambassador gets drunk at UN Party! Their country LOSES ONE TURN to restore diplomatic relations. NOTE: Does not apply once nuclear war has been started.
secret_alcohol.Short Desc: Enemy loses one turn if not at war

secret_grandmas.Name: GRANDMAS?!
secret_grandmas.Description: 2 Million of your highly moral little old ladies rebel against your country's military policies and disgustedly drive off in their electric cars to the enemy's country.

secret_shoes.Name: Hoarder!
secret_shoes.Description: Your enemy is caught with 400 pairs of shoes in their spouse's closet. 2 million barefoot natives disgustedly immigrate to your country

secret_time_travel.Name: Time Travel!
secret_time_travel.Description: Your scientists have learned the secret of time travel and although it is expensive YOU GET TWO TURNS IN A ROW

secret_lizard_monster.Name: Klodzilla!
secret_lizard_monster.Description: A giant lizard attacks your enemys biggest city. 5 million people are chewed up!

secret_rearm.Name: REARMAMENT!
secret_rearm.Description: You may (at your option) discard up to 7 cards from your hand (all at once) and immediately replace them from the deck.
secret_rearm.Short Desc: Discard up to 7 cards and re-draw from deck

secret_recall.Name: RECALL!
secret_recall.Description: Atomic Cannon manufacturer discovers defect - recalls all cannons. Anyone who has a face-up atomic cannon must discard it.
secret_recall.Short Desc: All face-up atomic cannons are discarded

secret_germ.Name: Super Germ!
secret_germ.Description: The result of a blunder in your enemy's germ warfare experiments destroys 25 MILLION of their own people

secret_earthquake.Name: EARTHQUAKE!
secret_earthquake.Description: A disastrous earthquake destroys 10 MILLION of the enemy population

delivery_b70.Name: B-70 Bomber
delivery_b70.Description: Carries any combination of warheads up to 50 megatons

delivery_saturn.Name: Saturn Missile
delivery_saturn.Description: Carries one warhead up to 100 megatons. Discard after use

delivery_atlas.Name: Atlas Missile
delivery_atlas.Description: Carries one warhead up to 20 megatons. Discard after use
delivery_atlas.Short Desc: Carries one nuke up to 20 megs. Consumable

delivery_polaris.Name: Polaris
delivery_polaris.Description: Carries one warhead up to 10 megatons. Discard after use

delivery_scud.Name: Scud Missile
delivery_scud.Description: Carries up to 20 megatons. Can be shot down by patriot <see actual card for more rules>. Discard after use

delivery_space_shuttle.Name: Space Shuttle
delivery_space_shuttle.Description: Carries one warhead up to 50 megatons or can be used to reload your space platform

am_patriot.Name: Patriot Anti-Missile
am_patriot.Description: Shoots down Scud, Atlas, Polaris, Titan, or Minuteman missiles
am_patriot.Short Desc: Counters Scud, Atlas, Polaris, Titan, or Minuteman

am_decoy.Name: Decoy Missile
am_decoy.Description: Cancel out one anti-missile or fighter

am_s.Name: Anti-Missile S
am_s.Description:
Intercept Capability:
Saturn
B-70 Bomber
ATLAS
POLARIS

am_b.Name: Anti-Missile B
am_b.Description:
Intercept Capability:
B-70 Bomber
ATLAS
POLARIS

am_stealth_fighter.Name: Stealth Fighter
am_stealth_fighter.Description: HOLD THIS CARD. Can be used to shoot down any bomber <see actual card for more rules>

special_trading.Name: TRADING SESSION
special_trading.Description: HOLD THIS CARD. Use when you wish to start a trading session

special_bomb.Name: Smart Bomb
special_bomb.Description: HOLD THIS CARD. This card may be used to double the power of a 10 or 20 megaton warhead

special_salvage.Name: Military Salvage
special_salvage.Description: Take an enemy's delivery system? <See card>

special_coup.Name: Public Relations Coup
special_coup.Description: SAVE UNTIL NEEDED. This card will cancel out one PROPAGANDA card played against you
